paragraph.sentence: On june 18th, 2019, the National Institute for Space Research (INPE) registered deforestation that amounted to 3.5 sq km in the TAPAJÓS ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION AREA, state of Rondônia, which accumulated 8 days with deforestation alerts in the month.
Deforestation totaled 8.334555363319664 sq km in the TAPAJÓS ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION AREA, in the analyzed month.
Deforestation was mainly caused by mining.

The main class of deforestation was CAUSE_1 .
